data.title: Kristyna Lindovska - 2015 - Women's Volleyball
data.meta_description: Kristyna Lindovska (14) OPP  - 2015: Unanimous first-team All-Patriot League selection … honorable mention AVCA All-East Region … became 12th player
data.text:
2015: Unanimous first-team All-Patriot League selection … honorable mention AVCA All-East Region … became 12th player in program history to reach 1,000 kills … finished her career with 1,049 kills … also ranked third in career block assists (318) and fifth in career blocks (359) at AU … played in all 35 matches, starting 26 … averaged 2.52 kills, 1.81 digs, 0.87 blocks and 0.31 service aces per set … registered four double-doubles on the season … led Eagles with 13 kills and 12 digs against Georgetown and added 11 kills and 11 digs versus George Mason … named DC Volleyball Classic tournament MVP … also earned Columbia Invitational all-tournament honors … finished with a season-best 21 kills along with 12 digs in four-set win at Army West Point … recorded nine kills and season-high 15 digs versus Lehigh … posted her final double-double of the season against Colgate, posting 10 kills and 12 digs … two-time PL Player of the Week … Academic All-Patriot League honoree … named to Patriot League Academic Honor Roll.

2014: All-Patriot League second-team selection … appeared in 33 matches, starting eight … averaged 1.99 kills and 0.95 blocks per set … recorded double-digit kills in four matches … finished with season-high 12 kills in four-set win versus Princeton (9/19) … posted season-high seven blocks at George Mason (8/30) and at Army (10/5) … hit career-best .625 with 11 kills and one error on 16 attempts against Bucknell (9/26) … named to the Patriot League Academic Honor Roll.

2013: AVCA All-America Honorable Mention … AVCA All-East Region Team honoree … All-Patriot League First Team selection … Academic All-Patriot League Team honoree … named to the ECAC All-Star First Team … appeared in all 37 matches with 36 starts … ranked first in the Patriot League with 3.56 kps … also averaged 1.58 dps, 0.76 bps, 0.19 aps, 0.12 saps and hit .285 on the year … recorded four double-doubles and tallied double-digit kills in 25 matches, including in seven straight matches from 9/15 to 9/25 … registered a career-high 24 kills, hitting .328, and adding a season-high six blocks against Xavier (9/21) … posted a career-high 12 digs three times against Xavier (9/21) and in back-to-back games against Army (10/5) and at Colgate (10/11) … recorded a career-high three assists against Holy Cross (10/4) … hit then-career-best .611, totaling 12 kills with one error on 18 attempts, at Loyola (Md.) (10/25) … two-time Patriot League Player of the Week (9/16, 10/14) and earned ECAC Player of the Week honors (9/18) … named to the Patriot League Academic Honor Roll.

2012: Appeared in 25 matches, starting 17 ... recorded 128 kills and 67 blocks ... averaged 1.78 kills per game ... notched double-digit kills three times during the season ... hit .269 on the year ... registered a career-high four service aces at Lafayette (11/3) ... named the Patriot League Player of the Week on Nov. 12 after hitting over .500, including a season-high .519 hitting percentage (15 kills, 1 error) against Colgate (11/9) ... set a career high with eight blocks in the Patriot League Championship game at Colgate (11/18) ... Patriot League Academic Honor Roll selection.
